metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34494 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: rpmsg_virtio_add_ctrl_dev in drivers/rpmsg/virtio_rpmsg_bus.c in the Linux kernel before 5.18.4 has a double free. It was discovered that the virtio RPMSG bus driver in the Linux kernel contained a double-free vulnerability in certain error conditions. A local attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
